OtherText.name: OfficialName
OtherText.val: ADRENAL GLAND: Biopsy (Core Needle, Incisional, Excisional); Resection

OtherText.name: Restrictions
OtherText.val: Protocol applies to adrenal cortical carcinoma only. Cortical adenomas, pheochromocytoma, neuroblastic tumors, and adrenal tumors of childhood are not included.

ListItem.name: Urin_17-ketosteroids_increased_33
ListItem.title: Urinary 17-ketosteroids increased (10 mg / g creatinine / 24 hours)

Section.name: Section_24855.100004300_118
Section.title: Additional dimensions (repeat section if more than one part)

Question.name: Tx_Effect_275
Question.title: Treatment Effect (applicable to carcinomas treated with neoadjuvant therapy)

ListItem.name: pT0_386
ListItem.title: pT0: No evidence of primary tumor

ListItem.name: pT1_387
ListItem.title: pT1: Tumor 5 cm or less in greatest dimension, no extra-adrenal invasion

ListItem.name: pT2_388
ListItem.title: pT2: Tumor greater than 5 cm, no extra-adrenal invasion

DisplayedItem.title: # Adjacent organs include kidney, diaphragm, great vessels, pancreas, and liver.

ListItem.name: pT3_391
ListItem.title: pT3: Tumor of any size with local invasion, but not invading adjacent organs#

OtherText.name: pT3_392
OtherText.val: pT3: Tumor of any size with local invasion, but not invading adjacent organs

ListItem.name: pT4_393
ListItem.title: pT4: Tumor of any size with invasion of adjacent organs#

OtherText.name: pT4_394
OtherText.val: pT4: Tumor of any size with invasion of adjacent organs

DisplayedItem.title: Note: There is no category of carcinoma in situ (pTis) relative to carcinomas of the adrenal gland.

ListItem.name: pN0_403
ListItem.title: pN0: No regional lymph node metastasis
